plot: Dion Agius and crew embarked on a journey to an unknown land. A journey that would bring Dion to unleash on the world's best man made wave. A studio for surfing. Smack in the middle of a desert mountain range.
title: Electric Blue Heaven
plot_es: Dion Agius and crew embarked on a journey to an unknown land. A journey that would bring Dion to unleash on the world's best man made wave. A studio for surfing. Smack in the middle of a desert mountain range.
plot_en: Dion Agius and crew embarked on a journey to an unknown land. A journey that would bring Dion to unleash on the world's best man made wave. A studio for surfing. Smack in the middle of a desert mountain range.
